body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Modeling
  • Added Network Modeling activity to Top Activities
    • Activity Stream is visible in Network Modeling for activities performed in Network Modeling mode.
    • Network Modeling activities are visible in Top Activities tab in Manage Users.
    • QA activities are visible in Top Activities tab in Manage Users
Compare Networks - Network Counts by Specialty Group
  • Modify Network Counts by Specialty to be by Specialty Group
Miscellaneous
  • Add "Network360" to subject line of user account creation email

Issues Fixed

Rank Networks
  • Network Ranking: incorrect error when deleting all rankings
